q: Life is and will ever remain an equation incapable of solution, but it contains certain known factors.
Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
Do not fight with pigs - you will be smeared in mud but the pig will like it.
The destiny of man is in his own soul.
Man is affected not by events but by the view he takes of them.
The world is a puzzle; no need to make sense out of it.
